item.title: Markdown Syntax
item.description: true Hello this is me. Headings The following HTML <h1>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest. item.title: Title of my Rmd
item.description: true R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:
